testcase.name: Auto-height block-containers produce fences
testcase.description: Block-containers with no height currently don't create a fence for spaces as they should (they behave like a normal block).

testcase.name: font-stretch NYI
testcase.description: Font-stretch is not implemented, yet.

testcase.name: linefeed-treatment
testcase.description: Preserved linefeeds in a fo:character are not handled correctly.

testcase.name: white-space-treatment
testcase.description: White space handling incorrectly stops at fo:inline boundaries when it comes to formatter generated line breaks.

testcase.name: Empty blocks produce fences
testcase.description: An empty block currently produces a fence for stacking constraints which it shouldn't.

testcase.name: block white-space nbsp 2
testcase.description: The nbsp given as an fo:character is not adjustable and therefore the justification does not work in this case.

testcase.name: block word-spacing
testcase.description: Word-spacing may not work as expected.

testcase.name: block word-spacing text-align justify
testcase.description: Word-spacing may not work as expected.

testcase.name: external-graphic don't shrink
testcase.description: Images currently don't shrink so they fit on a page when they are too big and shrinking is allowed to happen (min/opt/max).

testcase.name: Test case with HTTP URL
testcase.description: Doesn't work behind a proxy which requires authorization.

testcase.name: Space Resolution in foot note area
testcase.description: Space resolution does not work between footnote regions.

testcase.name: NPE for table inside an inline
testcase.description: Placing a table as a child of an fo:inline produces a NullPointerException.

testcase.name: Keeps on inline-container are not implemented, yet.
testcase.description: The keep-with-previous and keep-with-next properties have not been implemented on inline-container yet. They will be treated as if they had the value "auto".

testcase.name: Borders and padding inline-container are not implemented, yet.
testcase.description: Borders and paddings on an inline-container will be ignored.

testcase.name: inline letter-spacing
testcase.description: Letter-spacing may not work as expected within fo:inline.

testcase.name: inline word-spacing
testcase.description: Word-spacing may not work as expected within fo:inline.

testcase.name: leader-alignment NYI
testcase.description: Leader-alignment is not yet implemented.

testcase.name: leader-pattern="use-content": Problem with line height
testcase.description: Line height is not correctly calculated for use-content leaders whose height is larger than the rest of the line.

testcase.name: Page breaking doesn't deal with IPD changes
testcase.description: Page breaking currently doesn't support changing available IPD between pages of a single page-sequence. Element list generation has to be reset to redetermine line breaks in this case.

testcase.name: Overflow handing is incomplete
testcase.description: Line breaking is not 100% correct when there's too little space. Overflows are not detected and warned.

testcase.name: Indefinite page height handling is imcomplete
testcase.description: A RuntimeException is thrown for a page of indefinite height. Lots of warnings.

testcase.name: page-number-citation: Problem with background-image
testcase.description: Background-images on page-number-citations are not placed correctly.

testcase.name: IDs are not working on all FO elements
testcase.description: The "id" attributes are not properly handled for all block-level FO elements.

testcase.name: IDs are not working on all FO elements
testcase.description: The "id" attributes are not properly handled for all inline-level FO elements.

testcase.name: Footnotes in multi-column documents
testcase.description: Footnotes may overlap with text of the region-body in multi-column documents.

testcase.name: Column Balancing problems
testcase.description: Situation in a 4-column document where the column balancing doesn't work and even causes some content to disappear.

testcase.name: Column Balancing problems
testcase.description: Column balancing doesn't work as expected.

testcase.name: table-cell empty area with marker.xml
testcase.description: A table-cell producing an empty area does currently not add any markers to a page. See TODO entry in AreaAdditionUtil.

testcase.name: Border conditionality on table
testcase.description: The code should be ok, but the test case uses shorthands and therefore is probably not expressing the indended outcome according to the spec. The test case should be revisited.

testcase.name: Soft hyphen with normal hyphenation enabled
testcase.description: A soft hyphen should be a preferred as break compared to a normal hyphenation point but is not. Background info: see JIRA FOP-2466.

testcase.name: Page-keep not respected in multi-column layout
testcase.description: The block should cause overflow in the last column on the page, rather than be broken.

testcase.name: Block Container Reference Orientation Bug
testcase.description: An assert is failing

testcase.name: Writing mode problems
testcase.description: Test erroneously depends upon incorrect implementation of writing-mode trait derivation on fo:region-*.

testcase.name: Footnotes and "id" property
testcase.description: The "id" for fo:footnote and fo:footnote-body is properly processed, but implementation in the layout engine remains incomplete/
